alert.note: Alert for Bottineau; Dunn; McHenry; McLean; Mercer; Mountrail; Renville; Ward (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 4:31AM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF WARD, WESTERN BOTTINEAU, RENVILLE, NORTHEASTERN DUNN, NORTHWESTERN MCLEAN, NORTHWESTERN MCHENRY, SOUTHEASTERN MOUNTRAIL AND NORTHWESTERN MERCER COUNTIES THROUGH 500 AM CDT/400 AM MDT/... At 430 AM CDT/330 AM MDT/, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles east of Sherwood to 6 miles south of Des Lacs to Roseglen. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Antler around 445 AM CDT. Minot and Douglas around 450 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Surrey, Garrison, Westhope and Max. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 AM CDT/700 AM MDT/ for south central, southwestern, north central and northwestern North Dakota.

area.areaDesc: Bottineau; Dunn; McHenry; McLean; Mercer; Mountrail; Renville; Ward
